revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=R7800 |revision=-100NAS (v2) |series=AC2600 |asin=B0192911RA |newegg=9SIA6ZP61T0000 |est_release_date=01/04/2016 |fcc_date=11/04/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY315100319 |pcb_id=2976495801 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ8065 |cpu1_cspeed=1.7 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MT29F1G08ABBEAH4:E |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC128M16IP-DI |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, eSATA |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9984 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9984 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SE2623L;;4; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier Module;RFMD;RFPA5542;;4; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, VHT160, DFS, |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=DD-WRT (Kong), OpenWrt, [https://www.voxel-firmware.com/Downloads/Voxel/html/browse.html Voxel] |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=http://www.routerlogin.net |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui= |oui_eth= }}
:• '''1733''' Mbps - 4-stream 802.11ac device (433Mbps per stream), :• '''800''' Mbps - max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''2600 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Nighthawk X4S - AC2600 Smart WiFi Gaming Router}} :• ''802.11ac Dual Band Quad Stream Gigabit Router'' • :{{ProductPage|http://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/wifi-routers/R7800.aspx}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=R7800}} "2976495801" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC internal photos. {{see also|Netgear D7800|Netgear|Delta Networks}} * {{OpenWrtTechData|https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/netgear/netgear_r7800}}, {{OpenWrtWiki|https://openwrt.org/toh/netgear/r7800}} ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=289788 ''Netgear R7800 (Nighthawk X4S AC2600)'' on '''DD-WRT''' forums] *[https://forum.lede-project.org/t/netgear-r7800-exploration-ipq8065-qca9984/285 ''Netgear R7800 exploration (IPQ8065, QCA9984)'' on '''LEDE''' forums] ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32958-netgear-r7800-nighthawk-x4s-smart-wifi-gaming-router-reviewed ''Netgear R7800 Nighthawk X4S Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[https://openitforum.pl/index/recenzje/routery/netgear/r7800_nighthawk_x4s/ ''Netgear R7800 Nighthawk X4S'' on '''OpenITforum'''] (PL) ===News=== *[http://www.anandtech.com/show/9933/netgear-updates-networking-lineup-at-ces ''Netgear Updates Networking Lineup at CES 2016'' on '''AnandTech'''] :*[[Netgear R8500]] • FCC ID: PY315200309, PY315200310 (v1) ::Nighthawk X8 - AC5300 Tri-Band Wi-Fi Router [http://www.anandtech.com/show/9678/netgear-nighthawk-x8-r8500-wave-2-80211ac-router-set-to-ship PR] :*[[Netgear R7800]] • FCC ID: PY315200310, PY315100319 (v2) ::Nighthawk X4S - AC26000 Smart Wi-Fi Router ::IPQ8065 dual-core SoC &1.7GHz and the QCA9984 radio ::4x4 design supports 160MHz (or 80+80MHz), MU-MIMO :*[[Netgear R7500]] • FCC ID: PY314100258, PY314300288 ::Nighthawk X4 - AC2350 Smart Wi-Fi Router :*[[Netgear R7500v2]] • FCC ID: PY315100301 ::Nighthawk X4 - AC2350 Smart Wi-Fi Router ===See also=== *[[Netgear R9000]] • FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/PY316200339 PY316200339] (09/23/2016) :''Nighthawk X10 - AD7200 Smart WiFi Router'' *[[Netgear R8000]] • FCC ID: PY314200264 (10/05/2015) :AC3200 Nighthawk X6 Smart Wi-Fi Router *[[Netgear D7800]] • FCC ID: PY315200302 :AC2600 Nighthawk X4S VDSL/ADSL Modem Router
